meanings.definition: A group of hereditary genetic disorders that impair the body's ability to control blood clotting.
meanings.sent1: Hemophilias can make it difficult for the blood to clot properly.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying ways to treat hemophilias effectively.
meanings.sent3: The hemophilias in the family made blood tests a regular occurrence.
meanings.sent4: In a world without hemophilias, clotting would be swift and easy.
meanings.sent5: The impact of hemophilias on blood clotting is profound and challenging.

meanings.sent1: Living with hemophilias requires careful monitoring of clotting factors.
meanings.sent2: He was born with hemophilias, which meant frequent hospital visits.
meanings.sent3: The party theme was 'embracing your inner hemophilias' for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her love for adventure was like a wild case of hemophilias, always risky.
meanings.sent5: The uniqueness of his hemophilias condition made him stand out in the crowd.
